xml.name: cov_method_options
xml.option: trimmed_mean: Average number of aligned reads overlapping each position after removing the most deeply and shallow-ly covered positions.
covered_bases: Number of bases covered by 1 or more reads
length: Length of each contig in base pairs
count: Number of reads aligned toq each contig. Note that a single read may be aligned to multiple contigs with supplementary alignments
metabat: ("MetaBAT adjusted coverage") Coverage as defined in Kang et al 2015
reads_per_base: Number of reads aligned divided by the length of the contig
rpkm: Reads mapped per kilobase of contig, per million mapped reads
tpm: Transcripts Per Million as described in Li et al 2010
